title: Missing toolchain for cpu `s390x` in cc_toolchain_suite `@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:everything`

labels.name: P3
labels.description: We're not considering working on this, but happy to review a PR. (No assignee)

labels.name: help wanted
labels.description: Someone outside the Bazel team could own this

body:
### Description of the bug:


The following test cases failed on s390x and the log showed: cc_toolchain_suite `@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:everything` does not contain a toolchain for cpu `s390x`.
 

- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:CompileOneDependencyIntegrationTest
- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:DanglingSymlinkTest
- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:KeepGoingTest
- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:MiscAnalysisTest
- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:SkymeldBuildIntegrationTest
- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/remote:BuildWithoutTheBytesIntegrationTest
- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/skyframe/rewinding:RewindingTest

### What's the simplest, easiest way to reproduce this bug? Please provide a minimal example if possible.


Use the following commands to reproduce this bug on s390x:

```bash
bazel test -c opt --cache_test_results=no --build_tests_only --flaky_test_attempts=3 --test_timeout=3600 --show_progress_rate_limit=5 --show_timestamps --verbose_failures -- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:CompileOneDependencyIntegrationTest
bazel test -c opt --cache_test_results=no --build_tests_only --flaky_test_attempts=3 --test_timeout=3600 --show_progress_rate_limit=5 --show_timestamps --verbose_failures -- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:DanglingSymlinkTest
bazel test -c opt --cache_test_results=no --build_tests_only --flaky_test_attempts=3 --test_timeout=3600 --show_progress_rate_limit=5 --show_timestamps --verbose_failures -- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:KeepGoingTest
bazel test -c opt --cache_test_results=no --build_tests_only --flaky_test_attempts=3 --test_timeout=3600 --show_progress_rate_limit=5 --show_timestamps --verbose_failures -- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:MiscAnalysisTest
bazel test -c opt --cache_test_results=no --build_tests_only --flaky_test_attempts=3 --test_timeout=3600 --show_progress_rate_limit=5 --show_timestamps --verbose_failures -- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/buildtool:SkymeldBuildIntegrationTest
bazel test -c opt --cache_test_results=no --build_tests_only --flaky_test_attempts=3 --test_timeout=3600 --show_progress_rate_limit=5 --show_timestamps --verbose_failures -- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/remote:BuildWithoutTheBytesIntegrationTest
bazel test -c opt --cache_test_results=no --build_tests_only --flaky_test_attempts=3 --test_timeout=3600 --show_progress_rate_limit=5 --show_timestamps --verbose_failures -- //src/test/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/skyframe/rewinding:RewindingTest
```

### Which operating system are you running Bazel on?


Ubuntu Linux 18.04+

### What is the output of `bazel info release`?


release 6.0.0

### If `bazel info release` returns `development version` or `(@non-git)`, tell us how you built Bazel.


_No response_

### What's the output of `git remote get-url origin; git rev-parse master; git rev-parse HEAD` ?


https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel.git
0cc6bcdd1aed4dc3c5b8e5ed698b0cecc5a7c548
06deebfb5b73f848de5a0ea0e00fcfaa26788d1f


### Have you found anything relevant by searching the web?

#16525

### Any other information, logs, or outputs that you want to share?

Below is a sample error log for this bug on s390x:

```bash
WARNING: Aborting evaluation while evaluating ConfiguredTargetKey{label=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:everything, config=BuildConfigurationKey[5b08d93b65c880f913219b97af6813356806b99210ba601a90bee05bb9e6d755]}
com.google.devtools.build.lib.skyframe.ConfiguredTargetFunction$ReportedException: com.google.devtools.build.lib.skyframe.ConfiguredValueCreationException:
        at com.google.devtools.build.lib.skyframe.ConfiguredTargetFunction.compute(ConfiguredTargetFunction.java:465)
        at com.google.devtools.build.skyframe.AbstractParallelEvaluator$Evaluate.run(AbstractParallelEvaluator.java:571)
        at com.google.devtools.build.lib.concurrent.AbstractQueueVisitor$WrappedRunnable.run(AbstractQueueVisitor.java:382)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask$RunnableExecuteAction.exec(ForkJoinTask.java:1426)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask.doExec(ForkJoinTask.java:290)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool$WorkQueue.topLevelExec(ForkJoinPool.java:1020)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.scan(ForkJoinPool.java:1656)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.runWorker(ForkJoinPool.java:1594)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinWorkerThread.run(ForkJoinWorkerThread.java:183)
Caused by: com.google.devtools.build.lib.skyframe.ConfiguredValueCreationException:
        at com.google.devtools.build.lib.skyframe.ConfiguredTargetFunction$ReportedException.withoutMessage(ConfiguredTargetFunction.java:1301)
        at com.google.devtools.build.lib.skyframe.ConfiguredTargetFunction$ReportedException.<init>(ConfiguredTargetFunction.java:1289)
        ... 9 more

ERROR: /home/test/.cache/bazel/_bazel_test/d9685c15f98c03b8769a67343b120517/sandbox/linux-sandbox/77/execroot/io_bazel/_tmp/5e353c0368bf73ac79c3a9e1f245ff87/outputBase/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/BUILD:15:19: in cc_toolchain_suite rule @bazel_tools//tools/cpp:everything: cc_toolchain_suite '@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:everything' does not contain a toolchain for cpu 's390x'
ERROR: /home/test/.cache/bazel/_bazel_test/d9685c15f98c03b8769a67343b120517/sandbox/linux-sandbox/77/execroot/io_bazel/_tmp/5e353c0368bf73ac79c3a9e1f245ff87/outputBase/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/BUILD:15:19: Analysis of target '@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:everything' failed
```
